title: Rename website and add daily labour service

requirements.summary: Update the website name from 'Ajay Labour Service' to a new name specified by the user across all frontend files including SEO metadata, page titles, headers, footers, and About page content
acceptanceCriteria: All visible references to the website name are updated consistently across all pages
SEO metadata (title tags, meta descriptions) reflect the new name
Footer, header, and About page display the new name
No hardcoded references to the old name remain in user-facing content

file_operations.description: Update the <title> tag and meta tags (description, keywords, og:title, og:site_name, twitter:title) to replace 'Ajay Labour Service' with the new website name. Update all references to Tinsukia and Doomdooma if the new name changes service areas.
Update the header/navbar branding text that displays 'Ajay Labour Service' to show the new website name. Ensure the logo text in both desktop and mobile navigation reflects the new name.
Replace all occurrences of 'Ajay Labour Service' in the footer component with the new website name, including the company info section, service description, and any copyright text.

Update all references to 'Ajay Labour Service' throughout the About page content, including the page title, SEOHead component props, hero section, founder story, timeline entries, and values section to reflect the new website name.

Replace 'Ajay Labour Service' references in the hero section heading, SEOHead component, and any other mentions on the homepage with the new website name. Ensure the main value proposition messaging is updated consistently.
Update the SEOHead component props and any references to 'Ajay Labour Service' in the services page content with the new website name.
Replace 'Ajay Labour Service' in the contact page heading, SEOHead component, and contact information section with the new website name.
Update the page title, SEOHead component, and any references to 'Ajay Labour Service' in the booking form page with the new website name.
Update the CSS custom properties and comments that reference 'Ajay Labour Service' to reflect the new website name for brand consistency in styling documentation.

requirements.summary: Add 'Daily Labour Service' as a new service offering on the Services page with dedicated section including service description, features, typical use cases, and worker qualifications
acceptanceCriteria: A new 'Daily Labour Service' section appears on the Services page
The section includes a clear description of what daily labour services entail
Features and benefits are listed in a format consistent with other service categories
The service is visually integrated with the existing services layout

file_operations.description: Add a new 'Daily Labour Service' section to the ServicesPage component following the existing pattern of service categories (mason, electrician, plumber, painter, construction helper, daily wage labour). Include a heading, description explaining what daily labour services are (flexible workforce for various tasks, short-term projects, or temporary needs), a features list highlighting key benefits (flexible hiring, versatile skills, cost-effective for short-term needs, quick availability), typical use cases (event setup/cleanup, warehouse work, loading/unloading, seasonal work, temporary staffing), and worker qualifications (reliable attendance, physical fitness, basic task comprehension, adaptability). Position this new section after the 'Daily Wage Labour' section to maintain logical flow. Ensure the styling matches existing service category sections with consistent spacing, typography, and layout.

requirements.summary: Ensure the 'Daily Labour Service' is accessible from the homepage services preview section with appropriate call-to-action buttons
acceptanceCriteria: Daily Labour Service appears in the homepage services preview grid
CTA buttons (Call Now, WhatsApp, Book Now) work correctly for the new service
The service card maintains visual consistency with existing service cards

file_operations.description: Add a new service card for 'Daily Labour Service' to the services preview grid on the HomePage. The card should include an icon (use the existing generated/labour-icon.dim_150x150.png asset as it's appropriate for general labour), a heading 'Daily Labour Service', a brief description (e.g., 'Flexible workforce solutions for your temporary staffing needs. Skilled workers available for short-term projects, events, and seasonal work.'), and CTAButtons component with serviceType='Daily Labour'. Position the new card in the services grid alongside existing service cards (mason, electrician, plumber, painter, construction helper, daily wage labour). Ensure the card uses the same styling, spacing, and hover effects as existing service cards for visual consistency.
